languages.text: "Сияние Трона..." {n}Джай сжимает аквилу, с отвращением глядя на труп создания.{/n} "Мне приходилось сталкиваться с мутантами и в сточных канавах Футфола, и в глубинах подульев. Но этот... видели его глаза? Горят, словно угли в пустых глазницах".

traits.locale_text: "Сияние Трона..." {n}Джай сжимает аквилу, с отвращением глядя на труп создания.{/n} "Мне приходилось сталкиваться с мутантами и в сточных канавах Футфола, и в глубинах подульев. Но этот... видели его глаза? Горят, словно угли в пустых глазницах".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Light of the Throne..." {n}Jae clutches the Aquila, looking at the creature's corpse with disgust.{/n} "I had to deal with mutants both in the sewers of Footfall and in the depths of the underhives. But this one... Did you see his eyes? They burn like embers in the empty eye sockets."
languages.original_text: "Сияние Трона..." {n}Джай сжимает аквилу, с отвращением глядя на труп создания.{/n} "Мне приходилось сталкиваться с мутантами и в сточных канавах Футфола, и в глубинах подульев. Но этот... видели его глаза? Горят, словно угли в пустых глазницах".

languages.text: 「王座の光よ…」{n}ジェイはアクィラを握りしめながら、嫌悪感をもって生き物の死体を見ている。{/n}「フットフォールの下水道とアンダーハイヴの奥底の両方で変異体と戦ったことはあるわ。だけど、こいつは…こいつの目を見たかしら？空っぽの眼窩の中で火花のように燃えていたわ」
languages.original_text: "Light of the Throne..." {n}Jae clutches the Aquila, looking at the creature's corpse with disgust.{/n} "I had to deal with mutants both in the sewers of Footfall and in the depths of the underhives. But this one... Did you see his eyes? They burn like embers in the empty eye sockets."

traits.locale_text: 「王座の光よ…」{n}ジェイはアクィラを握りしめながら、嫌悪感をもって生き物の死体を見ている。{/n}「フットフォールの下水道とアンダーハイヴの奥底の両方で変異体と戦ったことはあるわ。だけど、こいつは…こいつの目を見たかしら？空っぽの眼窩の中で火花のように燃えていたわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Luz del Trono...». {n}Jae sujeta fuertemente el Aquila, mirando asqueada el cadáver de la criatura.{/n} «Ya tuve que tratar con mutantes en las alcantarillas de Paso y en las profundidades bajo las colmenas. Pero este... ¿Ha visto sus ojos? Arden como ascuas en cuencas vacías».
languages.original_text: "Light of the Throne..." {n}Jae clutches the Aquila, looking at the creature's corpse with disgust.{/n} "I had to deal with mutants both in the sewers of Footfall and in the depths of the underhives. But this one... Did you see his eyes? They burn like embers in the empty eye sockets."

traits.locale_text: «Luz del Trono...». {n}Jae sujeta fuertemente el Aquila, mirando asqueada el cadáver de la criatura.{/n} «Ya tuve que tratar con mutantes en las alcantarillas de Paso y en las profundidades bajo las colmenas. Pero este... ¿Ha visto sus ojos? Arden como ascuas en cuencas vacías».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “黄金王座在上啊……”{n}婕伊紧紧地握着双头鹰吊坠，一脸厌恶地看着面前的尸块。{/n}“无论是在落脚港的下水道，还是在巢都底层深处，我都和变种人打过交道。可这种东西……你看到它那双眼睛了吗？简直像眼窝里将熄的余火。”
languages.original_text: "Light of the Throne..." {n}Jae clutches the Aquila, looking at the creature's corpse with disgust.{/n} "I had to deal with mutants both in the sewers of Footfall and in the depths of the underhives. But this one... Did you see his eyes? They burn like embers in the empty eye sockets."

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上啊……”{n}婕伊紧紧地握着双头鹰吊坠，一脸厌恶地看着面前的尸块。{/n}“无论是在落脚港的下水道，还是在巢都底层深处，我都和变种人打过交道。可这种东西……你看到它那双眼睛了吗？简直像眼窝里将熄的余火。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Par la lumière du Trône... » {n}Jae agrippe son Aquila en observant avec dégoût le cadavre de la créature.{/n} « J'ai souvent eu affaire à des mutants, que ce soit dans les égouts de Castel ou dans les profondeurs des sous-ruches, mais celui-là... Vous avez vu ses yeux ? Ils rougeoient comme des braises dans ses orbites vides. »
languages.original_text: "Light of the Throne..." {n}Jae clutches the Aquila, looking at the creature's corpse with disgust.{/n} "I had to deal with mutants both in the sewers of Footfall and in the depths of the underhives. But this one... Did you see his eyes? They burn like embers in the empty eye sockets."

traits.locale_text: « Par la lumière du Trône... » {n}Jae agrippe son Aquila en observant avec dégoût le cadavre de la créature.{/n} « J'ai souvent eu affaire à des mutants, que ce soit dans les égouts de Castel ou dans les profondeurs des sous-ruches, mais celui-là... Vous avez vu ses yeux ? Ils rougeoient comme des braises dans ses orbites vides. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Licht des Throns ..." {n}Jae umklammert den Aquila und blickt angewidert auf die Leiche der Kreatur.{/n} "Ich musste mich sowohl in der Kanalisation von Footfall als auch in den Tiefen des Underhives mit Mutanten herumschlagen. Doch dieser hier ... Habt Ihr seine Augen gesehen? Sie brennen wie Glut in den leeren Augenhöhlen."
languages.original_text: "Light of the Throne..." {n}Jae clutches the Aquila, looking at the creature's corpse with disgust.{/n} "I had to deal with mutants both in the sewers of Footfall and in the depths of the underhives. But this one... Did you see his eyes? They burn like embers in the empty eye sockets."

traits.locale_text: "Licht des Throns ..." {n}Jae umklammert den Aquila und blickt angewidert auf die Leiche der Kreatur.{/n} "Ich musste mich sowohl in der Kanalisation von Footfall als auch in den Tiefen des Underhives mit Mutanten herumschlagen. Doch dieser hier ... Habt Ihr seine Augen gesehen? Sie brennen wie Glut in den leeren Augenhöhlen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Taht'ın nuru..." {n}Jae, Çift Başlı Kartal'ı sıkıca kavrayıp yaratığın cesedine iğrenerek bakıyor.{/n} "Hem Binliman kanalizasyonlarında hem de kovanaltıların derinliklerinde mutantların hakkından gelmem gerekmişti ama bu seferki... O gözleri gördün mü? Boş göz çukurlarında ateş yanıyor sanki."
languages.original_text: "Light of the Throne..." {n}Jae clutches the Aquila, looking at the creature's corpse with disgust.{/n} "I had to deal with mutants both in the sewers of Footfall and in the depths of the underhives. But this one... Did you see his eyes? They burn like embers in the empty eye sockets."
